entry.title: About Me: Yi-Chang Chen
entry.content:
YC / Yi-Chang Chen / é™³å®œæ˜Œ

YC currently serves as a Senior Technology Manager at MediaTek Research. He has over 6 years of research and development experience in machine learning, with a focus on language, visual, and speech AI. With 3 years of team leadership experience, he adeptly leads teams through the entire process from research to application of technologies. He has published 5 machine learning papers, including in renowned conferences such as INTERSPEECH, ASRU, and ICIP. Additionally, he serves as the webmaster of YC Note.

| Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yi-chang-chen-aba1b6114/
| Github: https://github.com/GitYCC
| Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ai.ycc
| Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/yc.note
| Website: https://ycc.idv.tw/
| Email: ycc.tw.email@gmail.com

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
ğŸ“Œ [Language] Developed Breeze-7B and BreeXe-8x7B, with Breeze outperforming other models at the same size level in Chinese, and BreeXe performing on par with GPT3.5 in both English and Traditional Chinese.
ğŸ“Œ [Speech] Proposed a novel prompt-sensitive speech recognition model, Clairaudience. Accepted for the paper at ASRU 2023.
ğŸ“Œ [Vision] Proposed innovative unsupervised domain adaptation methods for text recognition seq-to-seq models, achieving SoTA results on public datasets. Accepted for the paper at ICIP 2022.
ğŸ“Œ [Language] Introduced a novel architecture for Mandarin grapheme-to-phoneme (g2p) conversion, named g2pW, achieving SoTA performance on a public dataset. Accepted for the paper at INTERSPEECH 2022.

EXPERIENCE
ğŸ“Œ MediaTek Research, Senior Technology Manager | Mar. 2024 - Present @Taipei, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ MediaTek Research, Senior Machine Learning Researcher | Mar. 2023 - Mar. 2024 @Taipei, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ E.Sun Commercial Bank, Lead Machine Learning Researcher | Feb. 2021 - Mar. 2023 @Taipei, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ E.Sun Commercial Bank, Machine Learning Engineer | Mar. 2020 - Feb. 2021 @Taipei, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ Bridgewell, Machine Learning Engineer | Mar. 2018 - Mar. 2020 @Taipei, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ Ur Warm Pet Cafe, Resident Singer | Mar. 2017 - Mar. 2018 @Hsinchu, Taiwan
ğŸ“Œ TSMC, Photo Lithography Software R&D Engineer | Nov. 2015 - Mar. 2018 @Hsinchu, Taiwan

PUBLICATIONS
ğŸ“Œ Feng-Ting Liao, Yung-Chieh Chan, Yi-Chang Chen, Chan-Jan Hsu, Da-shan Shiu, â€œZero-shot Domain-sensitive Speech Recognition with Prompt-conditioning Fine-tuning,â€ in ASRU, 2023. [Paper][Code]
ğŸ“Œ Yi-Chang Chen, Yu-Chuan Chang, Yen-Cheng Chang, and Yi-Ren Yeh, â€œg2pW: A Conditional Weighted Softmax BERT for Polyphone Disambiguation in Mandarin,â€ in INTERSPEECH, 2022. [Paper][Code]
ğŸ“Œ Yen-Cheng Chang, Yi-Chang Chen, Yu-Chuan Chang, and Yi-Ren Yeh, â€œSMILE: Sequence-to-Sequence Domain Adaptation with Minimizing Latent Entropy for Text Image Recognition,â€ in ICIP, 2022. [Paper]
ğŸ“Œ Yi-Chang Chen, Yu-Chuan Chang, Yen-Cheng Chang, and Yi-Ren Yeh, â€œTraditional Chinese Synthetic Datasets Verified with Labeled Data for Scene Text Recognition,â€ in DLVDR Workshop on ICPR, 2022. [Paper][Code]
ğŸ“Œ Yi-Chang Chen, Chun-Yen Cheng, Chien-An Chen, Ming-Chieh Sung, and Yi-Ren Yeh, â€œIntegrated Semantic and Phonetic Post-correction for Chinese Speech Recognition,â€ in ROCLING, 2021. [Paper][Code]

HONORS
ğŸ“Œ The top 5% (rank: 34/12,784) of STAGE 1 of the Global Alphathon 2022, hosted by WorldQuant (2022)
ğŸ“Œ T-Brain: AICUP2021 Traditional Chinese scene text recognition 2nd Place (2021)
ğŸ“Œ Best Paper Award in ROCLING 2021 (2021)
ğŸ“Œ T-Brain: AICUP2021 Traditional Chinese scene text detection 7th Place (2021)
ğŸ“Œ Kaggle: Shopee - Price Match Guarantee Top 3% (2021)
ğŸ“Œ Kaggle: Shopee Code League - Address Elements Extraction Top 3% (2021)
ğŸ“Œ T-Brain E.Sun House Price Prediction Competition 1st Place (2019)
ğŸ“Œ Deans' Award for Excellent Master Thesis (2014)
ğŸ“Œ Honorary member, Phi Tau Phi Scholastic Honor Society of The Republic of China (2012)
ğŸ“Œ Excellent Graduate of Bachelor in Physics (2012)
